column4: FINALLY!!!  the magic combo:  sudo dpkg -i <package.deb>  ...   you guys must laugh when a rookie dwells over something so simple, but how gratifying to finally get it going!!!  another convert well on his way.   peace-out--
i am from Portland, OR and living in Vina del Mar, Chile.
hey all, can someone help me determine the root directory for apache2?  i see in the services that it is up, and i thought it was at: /var/www/
if you installed apache with apt-get, it should be there?
